RR.description: Sum of daily total precipitation amount

RRm.description: Mean of daily total precipitation amount

RR100week.long_name: Number of heavy precipitation weeks (precipitation >= 100 mm)
RR100week.description: count of weeks with weekly total precipitation equal or above 100 mm

RR1.description: count of days with daily total precipitation equal or above 1 mm

R10mm.long_name: Number of heavy precipitation days (precipitation >= 10 mm)
R10mm.description: count of days with daily total precipitation equal or above 10 mm

R20mm.long_name: Number of very heavy precipitation days (precipitation >= 20 mm)
R20mm.description: count of days with daily total precipitation equal or above 20 mm

R25mm.long_name: Number of super heavy precipitation days (precipitation >= 25 mm)
R25mm.description: count of days with daily total precipitation equal or above 25 mm

RYYmm.description: count of days with daily total precipitation equal or above {} mm

DD.description: count of days with daily total precipitation below 1 mm

CDD.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive dry days (precipitation < 1 mm)
CDD.description: maximum count of consecutive days with daily total precipitation below 1 mm

CWD.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm)
CWD.description: maximum count of consecutive days with daily total precipitation equal or above 1 mm

DSP.long_name: Number of dry spells (periods >= 5 consecutive days with precipitation < 1 mm)
DSP.description: count of occurrences of at least 5 consecutive days with daily total precipitation below 1 mm

DSPx.long_name: Maximum lenght of dry spells (periods >= 5 consecutive days with precipitation < 1 mm)
DSPx.description: maximum length of at least 5 consecutive days with daily total precipitation below 1 mm

WSP.long_name: Number of wet spells (periods >= 5 consecutive days with precipitation >= 1 mm)
WSP.description: count of occurrences of at least 5 consecutive days with daily total precipitation above or equal 1 mm

SDII.long_name: Annual mean precipitation amount on wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm)
SDII.description: annual mean total precipitation amount of days with total precipitation above or equal 1 mm

RX1day.description: maximum total precipitation amount occurring within 1 day

RX5day.description: maximum total precipitation amount occurring within 5 days

RXYYday.description: maximum total precipitation amount occurring within {} days

R75p.long_name: Total precipitation amount with precipitation > 75th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm)
R75p.description: annual total precipitation amount of days with precipitation above the 75th percentile of days with total precipitation above or equal 1 mm

RD75p.description: Number of moderate wet days (days > 75th percentile of daily precipitation amount on wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm) during reference period) (days)

R95p.long_name: Total precipitation amount with precipitation > 95th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm)
R95p.description: annual total precipitation amount of days with precipitation above the 95th percentile of days with total precipitation above or equal 1 mm

RD95p.description: Number of very wet days (days > 95th percentile of daily precipitation amount on wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm) during reference period) (days)

R99p.long_name: Total precipitation amount with precipitation > 99th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm)
R99p.description: annual total precipitation amount of days with precipitation above the 99th percentile of days with total precipitation above or equal 1 mm

RD99p.description: Number of extremely wet days (days > 99th percentile of daily precipitation amount on wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm) during reference period) (days)

RYYp.long_name: Total precipitation amount with precipitation > {}th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm)
RYYp.description: annual total precipitation amount of days with precipitation above the {}th percentile of days with total precipitation above or equal 1 mm

RDYYp.long_name: Number of days with precipitation > {}th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm)
RDYYp.description: Number of days with daily precipitation amount on wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm) > {}th percentile during reference period) (days)

R95pTOT.long_name: Precipitation fraction with precipitation > 95th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm)
R95pTOT.description: fraction of days with precipitation above the 95th percentile of days with total precipitation above or equal 1 mm

R99pTOT.long_name: Precipitation fraction with precipitation > 99th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm)
R99pTOT.description: fraction of days with precipitation above the 95th percentile of days with total precipitation above or equal 1 mm

RYYpTOT.long_name: Precipitation fraction with precipitation > {}th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm)
RYYpTOT.description: fraction of days with precipitation above the {}th percentile of days with total precipitation above or equal 1 mm

RR95p.description: 95th percentile of daily total precipitation amount

RRYYp.description: {}th percentile of daily total precipitation amount

PRCPTOT.long_name: Total precipitation amount of wet days (precipitation >= 1 mm)
PRCPTOT.description: sum of daily total precipitation amount on days with total precipitation above or equal 1 mm)

FD.long_name: Number of frost days (minimum temperature < 0 degC)
FD.description: count of days with daily minimum temperature below 0 degC

CFD.long_name: Number of consecutive frost days (minimum temperature < 0 degC)
CFD.description: count of consecutive days with daily minimum temperature below 0 degC

FDD.long_name: Number of delayed frost days (minimum temperature < 0 degC)
FDD.description: count of days with daily minimum temperature below 0 degC during the months of April to June

ID.long_name: Number of ice days (maximum temperature < 0 degC)
ID.description: count of days with daily maximum temperature below 0 degC

SU.long_name: Number of summer days (maximum temperature > {} degC)
SU.description: count of days with daily maximum temperature above {} degC

CSU.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive summer days (maximum temperature > {} degC)
CSU.description: maximum count of consecutive days with daily maximum temperature above {} degC

TR.long_name: Number of tropical nights (minimum temperature > {} degC)
TR.description: count of days with daily minimum temperature above {} degC

SQI.long_name: Number of uncomfortable sleep events (minimum temperature > {} degC)
SQI.description: count of days with daily minimum temperature above {} degC

HD17.long_name: Number of heating degree days (mean temperature < 17 degC)
HD17.description: count of days with daily mean temperature below 17 degC

GD4.long_name: Number of growing degree days (mean temperature > 4 degC)
GD4.description: count of days with daily mean temperature above 4 degC

GD5.long_name: Number of growing degree days (mean temperature > 5 degC)
GD5.description: count of days with daily mean temperature above 5 degC

GD.long_name: Number of growing degree days (mean temperature > {} degC)
GD.description: count of days with daily mean temperature above {} degC

GD5x.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive growing degree days (mean temperature > 5 degC)
GD5x.description: maximum count of consecutive days with daily mean temperature above 5 degC

GDYYx.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive growing degree days (mean temperature > {} degC)
GDYYx.description: maximum count of consecutive days with daily mean temperature above {} degC

CSDI.long_name: Cold spell duration index (days within periods >= 6 consecutive days with minimum temperature < 10th percentile)
CSDI.description: count of days within periods of at least 6 consecutive days with minimum temperature below the 10th percentile

WSDI.long_name: Warm spell duration index (days within periods >= 6 consecutive days with minimum temperature > 90th percentile)
WSDI.description: count of days within periods of at least 6 consecutive days with maximum temperature above the 90th percentile

CHD30.long_name: Number of consecutive heat days (maximum temperature > 30 degC)
CHD30.description: count of consecutive days with daily maximum temperature above 30 degC

CHD30x.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive heat days (maximum temperature > 30 degC)
CHD30x.description: maximum count of consecutive days with daily maximum temperature above 30 degC

BVP.long_name: Annual beginning of vegetation period (day when number of consecutive days with mean temperature > 0 degC is >= 200 days)
BVP.description: calendar day at which the count of consecutive days with daily mean temperature above 0 degC is above or equal 200 days

WiMa.long_name: Number of days with {0} degC < mean temperature < {0} degC
WiMa.description: count of days with daily mean temperature above {0} degC and below {0} degC

TG90p.long_name: Fraction of days with mean temperature > 90th percentile
TG90p.description: fraction of days with mean temperature above the 90th percentile

TX90p.long_name: Fraction of days with maximum temperature > 90th percentile
TX90p.description: fraction of days with maximum temperature above the 90th percentile

TN90p.long_name: Fraction of days with minimum temperature > 90th percentile
TN90p.description: fraction of days with minimum temperature above the 90th percentile

TG10p.long_name: Fraction of days with mean temperature < 10th percentile
TG10p.description: fraction of days with mean temperature below the 10th percentile

TX10p.long_name: Fraction of days with maximum temperature < 10th percentile
TX10p.description: fraction of days with maximum temperature below the 10th percentile

TN10p.long_name: Fraction of days with minimum temperature < 10th percentile
TN10p.description: fraction of days with minimum temperature below the 10th percentile

FG.description: mean of daily mean wind speed

UFG.long_name: Mean daily mean u-component of wind speed
UFG.description: mean of daily mean u-component wind speed

VFG.long_name: Mean daily mean v-component of wind speed
VFG.description: mean of daily mean v-component wind speed

FG8.long_name: Number of gale days (maximum wind speed > 8 Bft)
FG8.description: count of days with daily maximum wind speed above 8 Bft

FG9.long_name: Number of severe gale days (maximum wind speed > 9 Bft)
FG9.description: count of days with daily maximum wind speed above 9 Bft

FG99th.long_name: Number of days with daily maximum wind speed > 99th percentile
FG99th.description: count of days with daily maximum wind speed above the 99th percentile

FGD.description: mean of daily mean wind direction

CW.long_name: Number of cold & wet days (mean temperature < 25th percentile & precipitation > 75th percentile)
CW.description: count of days with daily mean temperature below the 25th percentile & total daily precipitation amount above the 75th percentile

CD.long_name: Number of cold & dry days (mean temperature < 25th percentile & precipitation < 25th percentile)
CD.description: count of days with daily mean temperature below the 25th percentile & total daily precipitation amount below the 25th percentile

WW.long_name: Number of warm & wet days (mean temperature > 75th percentile & precipitation > 75th percentile)
WW.description: count of days with daily mean temperature above the 75th percentile & total daily precipitation amount above the 75th percentile

WD.long_name: Number of warm & dry days (mean temperature > 75th percentile & precipitation < 25th percentile)
WD.description: count of days with daily mean temperature above the 75th percentile & total daily precipitation amount below the 25th percentile

VPD.long_name: Vapour pressure deficit (difference between vapor pressure at saturation and ambient vapor pressure)
VPD.description: vapour pressure deficit (difference between vapor pressure at saturation (derived from mean temperature and Magnus formulae) and ambient vapor pressure (derived from vapor pressure at saturation and relative humidity))

CWB.description: climatic water balance (difference between precipitation and evaporation (derived from latent heat flux and precipitation))

DTR.long_name: Mean diurnal temperature range (difference between maximum and minimum temperature)
DTR.description: mean diurnal temperature range (difference between daily maximum temperature and daily minimum temperature)

GSL.long_name: Growing season length (number of days between first occurrence >= 6 consecutive days with mean temperature > 5 degC and first occurrence >= 6 consecutive days with mean temperature < 5 degC
GSL.description: count of days between the first occurrence of at least 6 consecutive days with daily mean temperature above 5 degC and the first occurrence (within the last 6 month) of at least 6 consecutive days with daily mean temperature below 5 degC

CHDD30.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive dry heat days (maximum temperature > 30 degC & precipitation < 1 mm)
CHDD30.description: maximum count of consecutive days with daily maximum temperature above 30 degC (hot days) and daily total precipitation below 1 mm (dry days)

HI.long_name: Number of hot & humid days (ambient vapor pressure > 18.8 hPa)
HI.description: count of days with ambient vapor pressure (derived from vapor pressure at saturation (derived from mean temperature and Magnus formulae) and relative humidity) above 18.8 hPa
